name: Smelyj2.GitHub.io
body:
**# Andrey Lopata Summary**

* Lopata Andrey, 26 years old
* Not married, no children
* Kharkov, Ukraine
* Current job — Searching job

In my spare time I love to code sites and learn something knew.
I have skills to create sites and user interfaces. I am active opensource on [MyGitHub](https://github.com/smelyj2) - and here you in detail can become familiar with my works.

## Contacts

* +3 8 (068) 619-31-65
* mail - AndrWhat89@gmail.com
* Skype - Andrwhat89


## Skills
* HTML, CSS, CSS3(Less), RWD.
* JavaScript, JQuery.
* AJAX(JSON).
* Bootstrap.
* Photoshop/Gimp.
* PHP, SQL, MySQL - small client server applications, create registration forms and user authorization.
* Git.


## Education

* 01.09.07-15.02.13 National Technical University Kharkiv Polytechnic Institute
Specialist Electrical-Engineer, Building machine faculty

* 10.06.16–01.09.16  Courses from Epam Systems. Direction - Front-End(html,css,javascript).


## My own projects:

* [AJAXforms](https://smelyj2.github.io/AJAXforms/Solution/index.html) - form with validation on the client side data validation and error on the server side. After successful registration, go to page - [page2](https://smelyj2.github.io/AJAXforms/Solution/company.html)

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/AJAXforms/Condition/AJAXform - task.pdf)


* [remail1](https://smelyj2.github.io/remails/index1.html) , [remail2](https://smelyj2.github.io/remails/2/r0(30-40UU).html) , [remail3](https://smelyj2.github.io/remails/3/r0(reminder)(30-40UU).html) - Table layout mailings by mail


* [shop](https://smelyj2.github.io/shop/Solution/Solution/start.html) - Online store with a full shopping basket based on LocalStorage and detailed mapping of the goods.

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/shop/Condition/Task description.pdf)


* [RegForm2](https://smelyj2.github.io/RegForm2/Solution/index.php) - Registration form. Users are stored in the database and from the database goes uploading a sample of countries and cities.

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/RegForm2/Condition/Условие.docx)


* [add-comments-site](https://smelyj2.github.io/add-comments-site/Solution/www/index.html) - The ability to add comments to the site

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/add-comments-site/Condition/Front-end.png)


* [RiffPoint-test](https://smelyj2.github.io/RiffPoint-test/Solution/ww/index.html) - Built on bootstrap

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/RiffPoint-test/Condition/homepage.png)


* [aimProSoft-test](https://smelyj2.github.io/aimProSoft-test/Solution/www/index.html)

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/aimProSoft-test/Condition/1Cloth_and_Fashion-Home.jpg) , [specification2](https://smelyj2.github.io/aimProSoft-test/Condition/2Cloth_and_Fashion-TabletHome.jpg) , [specification3](https://smelyj2.github.io/aimProSoft-test/Condition/3Cloth_and_Fashion-MobileHome.jpg)


* [authorization](https://smelyj2.github.io/authorization/index.html) - Another registration form is working with cookies and sessions available after login user additional functionality - adding photos

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/authorization/ReadMe.txt)


* [PhoneCategory](https://smelyj2.github.io/PhoneCategory/index.html) - This is my first introduction to Angular1 js. Guided by the main site https://angularjs.org/


* [tabs](https://smelyj2.github.io/tabs/Solution/index.html)

_In detail becoming familiar with a requirement specification is possible here-_[specification](https://smelyj2.github.io/tabs/Solution/Condition/readMe.txt)


* [RegForm](https://smelyj2.github.io/RegForm/Solution/html.html) - Only the layout and form fields validation


* [Chat](https://smelyj2.github.io/Chat/Solution/index.html) - all is executed on CSS except a paper clip
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
